content: Blame the Warriors. If Harden or Leonard had taken a game off them last week, the script would be different. Leonard would be the superstar leading the Spurs to a 1 seed over the superteam. Harden would be the one-man team who can win against the best, not just the rest. Plus, y’know, the whole Durant thing. (Apropos of nothing — I would like to see KD’s reaction to finding out he is a Pokemon.)
